item.title: Predicting the Next Football Superstar
item.description: On July 27, 2011, a then 19-year-old Neymar nimbly dribbled past the Flamengo defense in the Campeonato Brasileiro and scored an extraordinary goal in the 25th minute of the game, bringing his hometown team, Santos, to a 3-0 lead. The unexpectedly brilliant goal won him the revered Puskas award that year and is widely regarded as Neymar’s arrival onto the international stage, poising him to be the next global superstar.
